name: SolidFuel Game Library
short_description: SolidFuel is a set of tools for game developers.  It is cross-platform, cross-language, and cross-toolkit.  The cornerstones of the SolidFuel platform are scenegraph-based graphics, which are a powerful way to organize your game scenes, and an event syste
